column3: “I ve been smoking this strain regularly for about three years now. Sometimes nothing can compare to that classic old school haze. The cerebral high is a hard-hitter, makes me extremely focused, talkative and happy, it erases every iota of stress within me and gives me monster munchies. But it also causes a bit of paranoia for a few mins, which is easy to handle for me. One of my all time favs. But if u have a tendenc...”
“Great for pain and definitely gives you a happy uplifting feeling,and also easy to be with it if you got anything to do”

“•yowza, what a mind+body euphoric🔥💣-blast!• Presently smoking a BEAUTY-bud — Curaleaf's T-25% Haze, and after a mere 3 small bong-tokes, am a giddy & childlike-high.. of which i have not been in a very long time!  • ¡Euphoria🔥overload! • • Highly recommend, albeit best-suited for long-timers. Newbies, start slow/even ONE hit w/any high-thc content, to truly enjoy this proud 🍊&🌲 piney parent of so many energizing...”
“It was awesome. I somked it on a warm sunny day, and everything began to shine in a strange kind of way. I can recommaned it to everybody. Awesome strain.”

“Had the Crockett Family Farms version of haze. This is a pretty powerful smoke. The citrusy aroma can't be beat, and this bud is the stickiest bud I've ever encountered. I like sativas but I usually like there to be some relaxing factor. I wouldn't say there is much of a relaxant effect. I don't feel that drop in anxiety like you do with most weed. However it still puts you in a great place. I feel very energetic rig...”

“The third picture in the gallery shows the best example of what I consider the best actual strain of haze. It's that fluffy nug that peels apart like a banana rather than having to grind it in a grinder.

It's what we call piff" which is a beige color accompanied by dark green tinges with dark hairs and smells like dryer sheets. We also call it Manhattan brown basement Haze because most of this particular type of ha...”"

“Being that Im from NY is basicly 1 of the most common strains in the city.Is like a must smoke,you cant come to NY and not smoke some HAZE,is like coming to the city without walking thru time square or eating a slice of pizza or even cheesecake.Hands down,the best HAZE I've ever had you can find it anywere in Washington Heights AKA HOME OF THE HAZE.”
“Wowie wow wow wow wow! Giant, dark green, wispy colas reek of lime leaf, bay leaf, and white pepper. High-energy saliva effect is intense and lasts four-plus hours. Thank you Haze growers!”

“There is much debate as to wether or not Haze's original genotype still exists; I for one am a believer. Haze still has one last stronghold: New York City. The immense popularity of Haze in NYC  incentives farmers to plant haze despite the long flowering times and low yields associated with the variety. Haze is immediately recognizable by its uniquely spicy smell and taste accompanied by a speedy sub-psychedelic cere...”
“I love this strain! I could smoke it all day. Doesn't make me sleepy”

“Wonderful taste of citrus, earth and a smoky sweetness.....Big head buzz. A little energized but relaxed....I vaped the Haze strain in a Rove cartridge.....Very nice.....but this stuff gives you SERIOUS MUNCHIES!”

“WITCH HAZE
I've been smoking 1 is fun" with my friend C.A recently (2-3 months). I've really enjoyed myself and actually have experienced really profound
column4: beautiful moments in my life. But.....Pink Haze AKA Witch Haze is and has been incorrectly advertised. This is currently my 2nd "1 is fun" with "said strain".

column1: My first experience caused me to question my mental health. I've questioned many things in my life but ne...”"

column3: “Super strong cerebral high. Gave me waves of energy. One of the best strains for partying or getting shit done.”

“@reviewmaster > “I despise Haze with an absolute passion.”

Relax, it's not that serious. Cannabis is kinda like sex or pizza in that: when it's good, it's great; and when it's bad, it's still kinda good anyway. 

“It's flavor is less than what's to be desired as are the medicinal effects.” <-- for you. Personally, I love haze strains and much prefer an interesting headspace over a so-called “couch-lock” high. 

I've...”

“I'm mostly an indica person myself, usually Sativas give me panic attacks if I smoke too much of them, so, I just stick with the indicas, but this one for a sativa is very relaxing and euphoric, I would definitely recommend this, and if you're a musician like me, it gives you creative juices and is definitely good for stress.”

“Unique smell- very different 
This what we call piff 
Love it - church funeral smell 😂😂😂😂😂😂hazeeeeee!
👍🏼”

“First off, I want fo say that this is excellent stuff :)
I can see why it's inspired so many of the world's greatest product.
As a 9 year long, daily or semi-daily toker (a doobie a day or two) with a slight tendency to get easily paranoid and anxious, occasionally panicked, (I'm a softie), the first thing I noticed at the peak of my high was the solid, powerful crispness and focus my senses gave me. Lucid and awake ...”

“Really energising and uplifting strain. Great for the day time or hanging out with friends. Can be quite racey in high doses but that is always the case for me with sativas. My batch was quite piney smelling but had a slight lemon taste. Munchies are immense though. Would recommend.”

“I am someone who suffers from anxiety/depression/OCD and other health issues including some GI/digestive ailments and this strain is what the doctor ordered literally. No anxiety, just a nice even euphoric buzz and just real mellow high. Best strain ever for me it solves a lot of stress and anxiety related issues that other strains/rx meds don't and doesn't knock you out! And don't let the looks fool you the buds are...”
“wow, nice against depression. You got a big smile on your face and be happy :3”
“Pretty cool effects, one of my favorites stains!”
“Great strain! Love the old school taste and smoke! A daytime medicine for sure. Makes you wanna experience life.”

“Look: A nice light green bud with some dark shades and yellow Hairs with a resiny cover.
Feel: Sticky hard long buds with a snap when broken.
Smell: Fruity and sour with some danky smell.
Taste: Fruity and some sour with a heavy weed taste.
High: An amazing euphoric experience with a great floty body high feel. Euphoria and creativity make this high one that is special. It creeps onto you like nothing else and wi...”

“Love this one. Most smoked and selled strain up here in germany. The high is very hard, the smoke is smooth and it makes me feel high every time i smoke it. 
Al in all it is my favoufite strain and the one that was in my first joint.”

“Look: A nice light green bud with some dark shades and yellow Hairs with a resiny cover.
Feel: Sticky hard long buds with a snap when broken.
Smell: Fruity and sour with some danky smell.
Taste: Fruity and some sour with a heavy weed taste.
High: An amazing euphoric experience with a great floty body high feel. Euphoria and creativity make this high one that is special. It creeps onto you like nothing else and wi...”
“wow, nice against depression. You got a big smile on your face and be happy :3”

“Love this one. Most smoked and selled strain up here in germany. The high is very hard, the smoke is smooth and it makes me feel high every time i smoke it. 
Al in all it is my favoufite strain and the one that was in my first joint.”
“Great strain! Love the old school taste and smoke! A daytime medicine for sure. Makes you wanna experience life.”
“Best strain. Energetic and uplifting, very social and potent. Has a distinct smell unlike any other strain, like a fruity flower field.”
“intense, relaxing, but super happy”
“good strain price went up at Lamota 150.00 just not fair”
“You cannot beat a good standard Haze, good taste and high,”

“Sadly, haven't been able to find that uptown haze, piff , Harlem haze, type stuff from back in the day...that was the best...didn't even look all that good in terms of structure but that unique smell and taste, man it was the best tasting bud ever.”
“As old school and nostalgic as they come. The Piff" is a classic sativa that has been the foundation of many of today's great strains. The smell is very distinct
column4: reminds me of a pair of leather shoes. The taste is hashy and earthy. The flowers were fluffy
column6: dark green with flecks of purple. The high is very heady and stony.”"

column3: “Washington heights haze is the best”

“I am not an sativa fan, until now.   WOW! The original haze from Canna-Connoisers in Toronto is phenomenal.  I normally always smoke a gram at a time and I had to stop halfway through because the high was that amazing. I sat back and enjoyed it.   It was a happy and relaxed feeeling.  The bud was of excellent quality. This is a true sativa. I am so happy I followed the budtenders advice and tried it.  For me this sat...”
“Great stain for smoking during the day. Smoked by myself and with friends and had a very chilled experience both times. Smoke some haze and watch Super Troopers it's a great time!”

“Seedsman's Original Haze. 
Mostly focused, motivated, and active, with periods of spacey or heady.  I got to a couple of jobs in the job jar but  It lost a star for pain relief. Busy, with a poor activity/pain-relief ratio. 
....  It earned the star back for music appreciation,  @>-,-  ,and enhanced orgasms.”
“good strain price went up at Lamota 150.00 just not fair”

“This is just a Haze
You've got to believe me
And I wish you were there
Just a matter of opinion. 

Step 1: Hotbox your small walk in wardrobe with an iPhone torch facing upwards for light, with different coloured lighters on top to create some mood lighting. 
Step 2: feed your iPhone chargers through the gap under the door
Step 3: Spend 3 hours there tanking joint after joint until you find yourself miming songs with...”
“Great stain for smoking during the day. Smoked by myself and with friends and had a very chilled experience both times. Smoke some haze and watch Super Troopers it's a great time!”

“I tried many of the Haze hybrids,  like Amnesia, SSilver, SLemon, but first time just pure Haze. It became a fave.  The taste when vaped is truly like  candy, sweet and unique to Haze. Recognize it in other hybrids of her. The effects are cerebral yet that bit of indica,  keeps it from being too energetic. In fact its a very Hazey sativa,  LOL. Uplifting,  relaxing,  perfect for movies or gaming. Or hanging out. I lo...”
“good strain price went up at Lamota 150.00 just not fair”
“Such an amazing classic strain! Perfect for being active and focused, as it is strong but not knock out weed. Helps with creativity and de-stressing.”
“One of my favorite strands from Rove. Perfect for a nice morning pick me up all the way till dusk! Sweet calm flavors really get the senses going”
“You cannot beat a good standard Haze, good taste and high,”

“This one embodies why I love cannabis. Creative, explosive, refreshing, elevating. My first experience with the straight haze was a handful of Pure Haze J’s from Greenhouse in Amsterdam on arrival. I went back every day that week! It was the correlative of the experience and I’ve smoked it ever since returning. I love all strains and experiences but this is one’s special. Clearly, legendary for good reason.”

“Sadly, haven't been able to find that uptown haze, piff , Harlem haze, type stuff from back in the day...that was the best...didn't even look all that good in terms of structure but that unique smell and taste, man it was the best tasting bud ever.”

“I tried many of the Haze hybrids,  like Amnesia, SSilver, SLemon, but first time just pure Haze. It became a fave.  The taste when vaped is truly like  candy, sweet and unique to Haze. Recognize it in other hybrids of her. The effects are cerebral yet that bit of indica,  keeps it from being too energetic. In fact its a very Hazey sativa,  LOL. Uplifting,  relaxing,  perfect for movies or gaming. Or hanging out. I lo...”
“Great daytime smoke.  Not too harsh and smells very fruity.”
“Perfect for individual smoking, very energetic. Better if used during day time.”
“The only strain that can get me very high”

“I fucking love haze. I am a skater and a musician and I find this strain really aids creativity and makes me super energetic. It is a very standard strain and it’s maybe not worth ranting about which is why I have  given it four stars instead of five but it certainly deserves some praising. The taste is very earthy which I personally really like and I would recommend this strain to anybody who hasn’t already tried it...”
“his strain is a pretty awesome strain it's a little spiciy but also creamy and sweet and the high is good too”

“Sativa & creates a head-high. Hits you quickly; you will feel like your head's flying. Cause a bit of paranoia and anxiety at moments but is still very positive and happy. Relaxes the mind and definitely a strain recommended to newbies. Makes you tired and is very good to sleep off, but if not slept off, it may cause head aches. Kind of plain and 'hazey' , with no fruitiness, but still a very nice & original weed sme...”
“Something you should not smoke before going to bed. Nice Sativa makes uplifted. Tastes good and fresh.”

“Gives a very nice relaxed and content high, definitely goes well with you somewhere to relax, very good night time strain for me. However, I was not a huge fan of the taste as it was a little too earthy for my liking. It also gave me quite a lot of anxiety and paranoia at points but overall not a terrible strain to be smoking.”

“Smoked a J with my boyfriend at the park. I kid you not, the most intense trip. I was in a vampire club, as a dancer. It was so trippy. And intense. I would definitely get it again and recommend it to others.”

“It produced an extremely racy, unstable, and mentally a downgrading experience.  This is one sativa that could knock the socks off of you and leave you in a mental introspection trap for hours. I caution the use of it. A Haze cross, such as Super Silver Haze, would provide a more stable experience. I would suggest not smoking pure Haze, because more likely it'll make you feel mentally hazed; which is bad for mental h...”
“hahhd”

“...i tried some Haze OG from Sun Grow in Desert Hot Springs the other day...this is an ol favorite of mine...who ever grew this knew what they were doing...tight dark nuggs...had that dank peppery taste...a couple of hits on my pipe and i was there"...this is an excellent example of a powerful Sativa that is every bit as good as anything that i've tried in my 46 years of sampling...excellent strain and this one was ...”"

“Quality strain, was able to smoke, be socialise more with people and want to talk about stoner stuff. Downside if you smoke enough you start to feel a bit wonky and hard to use the phone and forget what you’re doing. Really nice strain just to chill to though and listen to some music”

“real haze is untouched by the buds of today and gets rehashed to remodel its original beauty. not readily available due to crazy waits for less quantity. these buds are of the highest conniseur quality and deserve to be put there. made by the mystified haze brothers in the 70s and glorified throughout media trend. the myth is real”
“There is nothing like an amazing haze! I'd give anything to have a silver haze or some haze genetics from the mid 90's!!”

“Gives a very nice relaxed and content high, definitely goes well with you somewhere to relax, very good night time strain for me. However, I was not a huge fan of the taste as it was a little too earthy for my liking. It also gave me quite a lot of anxiety and paranoia at points but overall not a terrible strain to be smoking.”
“his strain is a pretty awesome strain it's a little spiciy but also creamy and sweet and the high is good too”

“Smoked a J with my boyfriend at the park. I kid you not, the most intense trip. I was in a vampire club, as a dancer. It was so trippy. And intense. I would definitely get it again and recommend it to others.”

“I️ Love it, good for ADHD, I️ usually take aderall and I️ didn’t and smoked this instead before school and I️t did the job perfectly, I’m also more creative, good strain for writers. Makes me happy and bubbly”
“hahhd”

“...i tried some Haze OG from Sun Grow in Desert Hot Springs the other day...this is an ol favorite of mine...who ever grew this knew what they were doing...tight dark nuggs...had that dank peppery taste...a couple of hits on my pipe and i was there"...this is an excellent example of a powerful Sativa that is every bit as good as anything that i've tried in my 46 years of sampling...excellent strain and this one was ...”"
“This review is for Colombian Haze" by little Egypt.(specifically shake). I wouldn't normally rave about shake at all
column4: but this stuff is excellent. It's 29% thc and it's 100% crushed flower. This was the first time trying Theyr brand of shake
column5: I used to think c resco was he best shake but these guys really go all out for superior quality in this shake. It looks like it was solid perfectly trimmed buds that they put t...”"

column3: “Amazing... THE KEYSTONE SATIVA. Note: Users with an an anxiety disorder would be advised to avoid consuming this stain as it's STRONG (sometimes even mildly psychedelic; similar to a weak dose of LSD) stimulating cerebral effects can induce intense paranoia and even panic.”

column3: “hahhd”
“This is an okay strain. I just didn't think the high lasted long. It was more of me being medicated for about 30 minutes and that was it. Great flavor though!!”

“Amazing... THE KEYSTONE SATIVA. Note: Users with an an anxiety disorder would be advised to avoid consuming this stain as it's STRONG (sometimes even mildly psychedelic; similar to a weak dose of LSD) stimulating cerebral effects can induce intense paranoia and even panic.”

“This is my #1 sativa strain for productivity or work, instead of it putting you in a fog or psychedelic headspace, it provides clarity and mental focus. Closest strain I have found to Durban poison but I believe that haze has a bit more euphoria. Great strain for all day, and for people who love wake and baking, just be aware of anxiety in high doses!”

“Sativa & creates a head-high. Hits you quickly; you will feel like your head's flying. Cause a bit of paranoia and anxiety at moments but is still very positive and happy. Relaxes the mind and definitely a strain recommended to newbies. Makes you tired and is very good to sleep off, but if not slept off, it may cause head aches. Kind of plain and 'hazey' , with no fruitiness, but still a very nice & original weed sme...”
“Was the first kind of strain i tried. I felt so relaxed. I hit it when i was drinking my morning coffe. With your favourite relaxing music you can trip in any place you want. Wake and bake.”

“Obtained some top shelf of this from Elemental Wellness in San Jose,CA. Being as it is a top shelf of the strain the effects were great, nice calming and relaxing mood when medicated on it. Overall a nice experience.”

“This is my #1 sativa strain for productivity or work, instead of it putting you in a fog or psychedelic headspace, it provides clarity and mental focus. Great strain for all day, and for people who love wake and baking, just be aware of anxiety in high doses!”

“Something you should not smoke before going to bed. Nice Sativa makes uplifted. Tastes good and fresh.”
“Definitely will make you happy. Love this because it's not a heavy body high well only if you smoke a little. lol. strong strain. Felt this one after the 1st puff.”
“Overall great high, had a nice uplifted high, just really nice.”
“There is nothing like an amazing haze! I'd give anything to have a silver haze or some haze genetics from the mid 90's!!”

“Smoked this for a period of a few weeks, out of joint, bowl, bong, and bubbler. Hits you quick, effects are not too hard but are very noticeable and turned into a great high. Unfortunately the effects don't last for a long period of time, only a few hours. To get the most out of this great strain, just smoke it bit by bit over the course of a few hours to get a good high going. Mangos can really help bring this strai...”

“I've heard this strain called ampheta weed" and it is an apt description. My buddy and I smoked three Js over the course of the night when we went to a premiere in LA. Lucid and relaxed without amplifying the alcohol we drank.

column1: It was very smooth with hints of spice and vanilla. Clean
I didn't experience any of the paranoia or anxiety others mention. This is a good wake-and-bake strain....”"

column3: “hahhd”

“Been searching near and far for years, and about 15mins before the blizzard hit south jersey, i finally found it. Some orignal haze. A chance encounter with someone who had just harvested a indoor batch of orignal haze from clone. I was skeptical, but after catchin a pungent whiff in his driveway, i was excited. The buds were dusted with crystals and looked beefier than the haze i remember, but the smell was dead on....”

To get the most out of this great strain, just smoke it bit by bit over the course of a few hours to get a good high going. Mangos can really help bring this strai...”

Relaxes the mind and definitely a strain recommended to newbies. Makes you tired and is very good to sleep off, but if not slept off, it may cause head aches. Kind of plain and 'hazey' , with no fruitiness, but still a very nice & original weed sme...”

“This strain didn't have a strong scent to it like I hoped it would have. The trim job was also slacking a little and the medium sized nugs were dense to the touch. Once broken up it reminded me of a nice, fresh lemony scent. Although The effects didn't last to long for me after smoking this strain so I found myself smoking more & more of it each time. I would gladly pass this strain up and look for something with str...”
“hahhd”

“Gives a very nice relaxed and content high, definitely goes well with you somewhere to relax, very good night time strain for me. However, I was not a huge fan of the taste as it was a little too earthy for my liking. It also gave me quite a lot of anxiety and paranoia at points but overall not a terrible strain to be smoking.”
“Overall great high, had a nice uplifted high, just really nice.”

“Haze is amazing, I don't know what the previous commenter was thinking. This is the original, hard-to-find (due to the super-long flowering period that can take as long as six months) old-school electric weed that you read so much about in the pages of High Times. Uplifting, social, creative, good for parties and hikes... Possibly could lead to anxiety in some, although I actually use it to ward off the panic attacks...”
“Takes me to another world. Strong head high, small body high, that is just...relaxing. Good to watch a film with, listen to music and for chilling.”

“I despise Haze with an absolute passion. I understand the need for a variety of cannabis strains but for me, personally, I avoid anything mixed with Haze. It's flavor is less than what's to be desired as are the medicinal effects.”

“Smoked 2 bowls with some friends.  Tasted great, and burned pretty smoothly.  We were convinced the cops were after us, and so was everyone else outside.  We went to Pizza hut and just could not shut up.  Besides the fact that everyone knew we were high and the waitress was clearly annoyed.  It was funny as shit.  
Friend- Did I shit myself?"

column1: Friend-"Nahhh... wait did I? What the fuck?"

column3:

We went to Pizza hut and just could not shut up.  Besides the fact that everyone knew we were high and the waitress was clearly annoyed.  It was funny as shit.

column1: Friend-"Nahhh... wait did I? What the fuck?"

column3:
“Haze is one of my favorites. I recently got in in a Dutch coffeeshop. 
Haze made me really giggly, I had a really hard time trying to control my laughter. I also appreciated Doritos way more while I was high. 

It's really good in social settings where you want to have conversations, I really bonded with somebody when we were high on this.”
“Good to smoke at daytime. Maybe a bit paranoid, but its ok to handle.”
“Smokes really well and gives you a great buzz but paranoia can come on fast. smokes best out of a nice fat j”

“its a good strain to listen music on because its gives a intens high in youre head with the good vibes.
experience this weed and you know;).
peace”
“Excellent strain. Me and my friend have been smokin it for 13 hours. Its incredible.”
“I love this strain”
“Very nice and enjoyable taste, nice and warm high, relieves pain well. I wouldn't say it's beginner friendly.”
“Very nice and enjoyable taste, nice and warm high, relieves pain well. I wouldn't say it's beginner friendly.”
“Gets me so high and in a funny mood. Can't stop laughing! Great to smoke with friends, you will experience great moments.”
“beautiful mother nature”
“Smoked before work and was super motivated didn't even have to check the time :) the hours just went past me”

“Had a 1/4 of this strain. Me and my friends had a stressful day and wanted to just relax so we had smoked this. Being a lightweight, one joint and one bowl pack had me stoned, but we packed 4 bong packs 3 bowl packs and 3 joints. We were gone, i sat and ate a box of cheese-its for an hour and then was calling my friends different names. VERY strong strain, puts you right to sleep. Reccommend it for insomnia and as a ...”
“Not the best i have ever smoked, i expected a lot more from this strain.”

“Sometimes it is nice to just go back to some of the old school strains and even to this day they still do not disappoint. very tasty strain as well as a nice happy high to get your day started or night started. Ive been smoking this strain for just over 2 weeks now and as an indica lover by nature this sativa has became my favorite sativa to just sit down and chill, either with friends or just by yourself.”

“When it comes to the actual high and medicinal benefits, haze is a 5 star strain. The reason I rate it a 3 is because I'm all about taste. That being said I have a really picky taste. I found as a concentrate, it tasted very similar to MK Ultra which isn't even closely related. If you like that funky tangy unusual taste you will love it.”

“When it comes to the actual high and medicinal benefits, haze is a 5 star strain. The reason I rate it a 3 is because I'm all about taste. That being said I have a really picky taste. I found as a concentrate, it tasted very similar to MK Ultra which isn't even closely related. If you like that funky tangy unusual taste you will love it.”

“This strain gave me static hallucinations. Unlike an LSD or Mushroom hallucination where the hallucination is dynamic, changing, moving. Rather certain things; such as logs in a fire would appear to have a static non-moving image. I knew it was a log but I was seeing an intricate image on it that I knew was not really there. While that was enjoyable overall I found that this strain was far too trippy and emotionally ...”

“ANOTHER ONE!!! This one is one of my ALL TIME favorites !! Haze has never let me down! It always puts me in a great mood and leaves me clear headed. From the smell to the sweet taste to the euphoric feeling, haze is my favorite!!!”
“Seriously amazing strain! Tastes amazing and it feels smooth when you smoke it. Laughs, munchies,... everything was awesome. Everyone should try it!”

“Makes EVERYTHING more colorful and beautiful, good for a sunny day in the forest.... 

just burn in the woods and WOW!
You'll feel like you'r in the movie AVATAR, the colorful forest :)”

“Too strong! I get uncomfortably high from the Haze strain and all of its offshoots - Haze Wreck, Moonshine Haze, etc. Three puffs got me too high while on vacation in Colorado last week - the herb was called Hazelnut Cream. Duh! Haze! It’s very very strong - ya been warned!”

“When I first started learning about differnet strains this one was like the light going off in my head. It had an earthy taste and I thought it was just bad weed, but when I found out it was supposed to taste like that, I was like AHHHH".”"

“You know it's loud when you take first hit cause the smoke is just smooth. I'm high as I'm posting this. You notice your high coming on the first hit you take. If you gotta go home to the parents and you a beginner, I recommend you not being in part of the pass. You're going to get paranoid by wondering if they're going to think you're a fail.”
“Mmmmmmm!!!!!!!”
“Just good weed.  I really enjoyed this because it does the job for a simple name.  Big bud,  good look, burn, flavor is ok, powerful enough.”

“This was a real get up and go Strain. Gave me anxiety. Made my heart race. The feeling was kind of like a strong cup of coffee. Wasn’t for me. 
Everyone reacts differently keep in mind.”

“Generally, I liked this strain. It’s very strong and the effect stays very long. 
Though, it can cause depressive phases from time to time. So if you have a history of such events, I don’t recommend this strain.”
“A classic strain, and it has a very sativa like high. Good for when you want to chill with friends, the nugs are pretty good size and it definitely lives up to its reputation.”
“Really smooth. Give 5 mins after a hit and your vision will get wavy ;)”
“classic strain”
“The haze in my goos keep me dazed and confused"-Flame Gang”"
“very nice and chill”
“It is very relaxing euphoric type of feeling. good for stress and anxiety”
“Perfect strain when being around friends. Wish there existed a hybrid with outer space ro create Outer Space Haze... That would be my dream kush 😍”
“Smoked before work and was super motivated didn't even have to check the time :) the hours just went past me”
“the haze i got from san diego was fucking bomb.. but this haze i got is not good man..”

“This strain is a classic, and a mellow kind of high, which I enjoy during the daytime. It keeps me energized and happy, floating on cloud 9 without too much of a hard-hitting high. I'm able to go through my everyday routine while smoking this strain with absolutely no drawbacks, except slight paranoia. It's more of a simple, classic strain, but I enjoy it tremendously.”

“ANOTHER ONE!!! This one is one of my ALL TIME favorites !! Haze has never let me down! It always puts me in a great mood and leaves me clear headed. From the smell to the sweet taste to the euphoric feeling, haze is my favorite!!!”
“most all of the Hazes are very good smoke.good smell.earthy ,fruity,and a piney bit to it also.Hazeis always good to do stuff in but it can be relaxing also if u want.a classic!”

“When I first started learning about differnet strains this one was like the light going off in my head. It had an earthy taste and I thought it was just bad weed, but when I found out it was supposed to taste like that, I was like AHHHH".”"
“Good weed overall”

“definitely gave me one of the best highs 
hard strain to find 
just took a few puffs, not a lot to be pretty baked 
really good hope to smoke it again”
“This strain makes you see the world from a dreamy but concentrated point of view.it provides sativa effects but also provides relaxation without having physical or sedative indicate like effects”
“great flavor and good energy”
“Very nice high, but a little too strong for my taste.”

“Too strong! I get uncomfortably high from the Haze strain and all of its offshoots - Haze Wreck, Moonshine Haze, etc. Three puffs got me too high while on vacation in Colorado last week - the herb was called Hazelnut Cream. Duh! Haze! It’s very very strong - ya been warned!”

“Pretty good for a sativa. I love the foggy effect and the sour taste. It's like a cloud in your forebrain and nothing can beat that. It's appreciable. After you would try to built the mood another time by yourself and this is at this moment you will realise you can't without the MaryJane flowers. I tried a lot of different phenotypes.”
“Just good weed.  I really enjoyed this because it does the job for a simple name.  Big bud,  good look, burn, flavor is ok, powerful enough.”
“I had blueberry haze but it is still very similar very quick head high”

“Light green, strong piney taste.  About 5-10 minutes after smoking it gradually creeps up on you, and just lasts forever.  I smoked this at 3:40 and didn't feel normal til after 9.  Once you sit down, you don't get back up.  All in all, its worth smoking.  7/10.”
“Probably the best strain I ever tried!”
“A classic strain, and it has a very sativa like high. Good for when you want to chill with friends, the nugs are pretty good size and it definitely lives up to its reputation.”
“I just started dabbling with Haze, and it's pretty good stuff. When you smell the bag, or bud, you don't really get the aroma you'd expect. But once you snap it open it's like Bam"
“Not a mind-bender, but very steady, huge munchies, very nice happy mood”
“Casually just makes its way into so many strains that its hard not to like!”
“Love this strain. It's smooth, but wicked. Makes me ridiculously happy”
“Just tried the Lemon Haze and original is just a classic. What I remember about marijuana when I was 20 years old. Easy smoke with a nice heady high with a relaxing body tingle”

“I recently came across an Alaskan take on Haze called Ni kiski Haze and it blew my mind.. It was so overwhelmingly euphoric and then relaxing as the body high took over. It felt blissful but it was not get up and go bud. It is excellent if you want to melt happily into your sofa and watch a movie or listen to some good times. It worked well on pain as I have severe arthritis and it didn't make me raid the fridge. I w...”
“got this strain, had little green crystals on the inside of the bud, never seen this before”

“Smooth high, but real paranoid. My senses were heightened, especially sounds. Munchies were mild. 

I smoked this at a coffee shop in Amsterdam. Felt great until we left to go for dinner and explore more. Good smoke for socializing with friends and chilling. Wouldn't recommend it if you are planning to party/bar hop, the paranoia takes over. (I'm a regular smoker)”

“Haze is definitely one of my favorite buds. There are a few sativas like haze that give you this strong cerebral/slight body high. Awesome to smoke in the morning/at lunch/after lunch/after work/before,during and after a party. 

This is really one of the best/easy to find sativas”

“This was a real get up and go Strain. Gave me anxiety. Made my heart race. The feeling was kind of like a strong cup of coffee. Wasn’t for me. 
Everyone reacts differently keep in mind.”

“Earthy and sweet
Never lets me down, it’s a popular strain where I flex so Im no stranger to a hazey j. 

The taste gets a bit boring if you smoke a lot of it but it gets the job done”
“tried Electric Haze. very nice psychedelic and euphoric high. spaced out a lot. will def buy again”
“Trippy”

“Amazing strain! I was immediately struck by the complex, pungent smell of this bud. I expected the taste to be similar and was not at all disappointed as I was met with one of the most distinct and individualistic flavors I have ever tasted (in general, not just bud). Adjectives I would use are spicy, sour and metallic, with dashes of peppermint and cinnamon. Even that barely approximates the bewildering taste of Haz...”
“The tasty is too earthy, particularly in didn't like the tasty. The smell is nice. At first you get pretty stoned and them you get creative.”

“This was a very Intense head high on the upswing. Really nice to come down off of though, helped with anxiety and made my evening really relaxed. The high is Intense at first as I'm rather new to using regularly. But it was the most relaxing high coming down. Nice strain.”

“Haze is one of my favourite strains. It has given me some of the best highs. I once smoked Haze, thinking it was a lower grade strain. When I realised it's Haze I was already baked AF. I definitely recommend this strain if you want to experience a memorable high. 

Stay Irie ❤💛💚”
“Wonderful strian.  Very creative in energy, uplifting mood, great for yard work.”
“Great strain, visuals are wavy and you feel extremely euphoric. Only downside is that everytime I smoke this I get pretty paranoid at times, but easy to ignore.”
“A very sticky light green bud, covered in tricomes. It smells and tastes sweet and burns rather slowly. It made me feel very relaxed without taking away my motivation to do my errands that day.”

“(Flying dutchman's ''Original Haze'')
Very sativa-high, so not what I'm looking for (GI disorder), but one of my favorites for the flavor and smell. Buds are loose and very sticky (like you would find on a strong Kush), smell sweet as well as like vanilla. High is very heady and pretty focused for a 90-95% sativa. Recreational. Must try!
-------------------------------------
(''Original Haze'' par Flying Dutchman)
Un...”
“Fun for the day!”
“Good but there are better Haze" strains. It doensn't give me the enercetic buzz as "Super Silver Have" and Silver Haze. makes me sometimes axcious and a headache when I over do it.”"

“Pros : breaks down pretty nice,heavy buzz high, makes you energetic and the giggles, and the taste is rather diesel but a lil spicy 

Cons : Doesn't last that long if you are not smoker.”

“beautiful strain I love the strong sativa effects makes me feel care free and energetic, very few and far between trying to get hold of this strain in the uk is hard to come by but we all appreciate this lovely bud”
“Good buzz nice cerebral high and very relaxed but productive. taste sweet and burns nice definitely recommend.”
“nice head high but not my preference”
“Perfect, balanced Sativa. This strain leaves me clear headed and alert while still calming my nerves. Motivating and uplifting!”

“The combo of distinctly fruity and earthy tones makes this strain a joy to cook with.
Made a blackened swordfish that knocked me on my ass.”
“Nice and relaxing”
“great product available for legal purchase in Canada hits you like a tank but you can still function, be warned leaves you hungry and seeking munch”
“Haze is a classic sativa strain. It produces a strong head high and absolutely no body high.”
“A uniquely sweet, earthy smoke that tastes like mushrooms and pine. Head rush and tingling start immediately. A heavy sativa high sets in with great energy and mood lift. A classic!”
“munchies attack”
“Very good flavor , up high type of buzz, good for depression, energy , and or munchies”
“taste , effects, bag appeal”
“Don't forget in top 15.  Nice in middle,   Dreamy”
“I have always loved the warm buzzy cerebral high, mixed with the sweet earthy taste. In my experience it has always been quite tasty, no matter the grow quality.”

“Had a couple of haze strains from different batches in the last few weeks.  From this I would say there is a strong sharp scent that is given off. The taste again carries a tang with it.  I have found that the high uplifts me but also weirdly makes my body feel heavy.  Also with it being a Sativa, it can cause some paranoia depending what the situation is where you are smoking it.  Wouldn't describe it as a knockout ...”
“It's delicious and clean tasting. Straight FIRE!!”
“i got some piff bud rn 😂”
“Had blueberry haze it's good”
“Super long-lasting head buzz. Great for early morning and noon time.”
“Very cerebral. Definitely gets you active, though personally I found myself going borderline ADD when overindulging. Nice sativa.”
“yummy awesome haze.”
“Decently uplifting”
“i like it because it make me very high but if i smooke Haze longer and have no other kind of weed it makes me not so high and stoned.but is a classical sort and its good to smoke every time :)”

“I must say I’ve tried and tried to find something in life that can get me to be uplifted and this is by far the best thing to do that when on this strain i a talkative, outgoing, focused person I look forward to coming home and smoking this.”

“It's a alright strain, the taste and smell isn't as good as expected.”
“very good”
“I'm vibin
column5: I'm kickin back and I'm good" Mila J. Awesome feeling mostly in the head but relaxing. It's strong as fuck! It's amazing I'm smiling like shit!!”"

column3: “I can't tell if I like it or not. it's amazing for stress, but if I even get slightly overworked I feel my heart pounding in my chest. it's pretty good for pain, and when I am relaxed and happy it's a wonderful high. but when I start to slip into negative space I have to talk myself out of it. it's a little to emotionally slippy for me.”
“got it just about finished, buds are thick heavy and tight”
“Wow, this strain is amazing, but i recommend not to mix it with other strains of for the britain out there don't mix it with tobacco, smoke it pure.”
“An all-time classic.  Spicy and cerebral, this is definitely a daytime strain for me.”

“Mate smoked dis n didn't even want to move jus lie down mate said he had some as his brother goes to the same dealer I go to and said he was jus catatonic on the couch but nice strain not a fan of the taste tho”

“Since I am one of those low tolerance Medical Patients, I was a little hesitate to try this strain because of the higher THC , but because HAZE's aroma was so alluring I had to try it and to my surprise I found it to be very effective for pain and inflammation. 
I also found it to be very relaxing and calming affect. 
Do not need very much 1-2 puffs done! effects last 2-4 hours.
Haze is one of those strains that can ...”

“Had some mids while in Amsterdam. It was a great, caffeine-like high. I felt super talkative and energetic. There was some anxiety there, but I was blazed (having that heart-racy feeling) and we got lost in the city.

On other days, smoked it while exploring outdoors. The high euphoric and energetic. It made me feel like a 12 year old while riding on bike trails. All of my typical joint pain faded. 

I would say be c...”
“great just great . well worth the time and money hope you keep these types of meds and the affordable prices thanx great product”

“this is a decent strain for stress relief and a little uplift but it's not nearly as potent as some of the new school strains of haze that are around today. this classic is great to have on hand but it's nothing too special if you enjoy a recreational buzz in addition to your medicating effects. by the way, those effects will be stress-melting relief without the anxiety that some stronger haze's like super silver Haz...”
“haze is always good, a classic in my book”
“Blaze the hell out of your head loll”
“Very underestimated strain. The smell can relate to super silver hashplant it has the effects of a uplifted and dizzy hit. The taste has a lemon & super earthy flavor a good strain undoubtedly!”
“Been smoking it all weekend and had an overall great experience. Definitely gets you talking or writing if you are suffering with writers block.”

“Had this when I went to a party, on NYE ! this bud will never get old, pissing myself at what everyone was doing even if it wasn't funny, I like to keep a good stash of this as haze as it is well suited to me! Praise the haze”

“I tried the Haze by Virtue Las Vegas and this is the second Sativa Ive tried and I really loved it. It gave me an instand head high but it wasnt overpowering. I did not get paronoid or anxious, which is a plus in my book. I actually sampled this strain and ended up purchasing it. I was relaxed but in a sense of Euphoria and it was amazing. It felt like the first time I smoked ever, which threw me for a loop because I...”
“its very nice”
“Amazing high & taste... Slow creeper into intense head high. Very happy & thoughtful.”
“beautiful mother nature”
“It was a very fast acting, potent strain that got me feeling good after one hit. very heady but I got the warm fuzzies all over. I would highly recommend!”
“Very smelly and stinky. Taste good and a good body high”
“1Gram Fissa”

“Great wake and Bake Med.. Uplifting. Mind /Body 
Overwhelming feeling to do something positive or constructive. 
I deal with chronic nerve pain,depression and seizures .
Haze is wonderful for daytime medication.”

“Got this on a recommendation from one of the guys at Five Zero Trees East side. I loved it. Pretty mild but definitely helped my pain and relax. 2 hits and it kicked in. Also got Banana OG and it's now a favorite.”
“just good experiences with this nice strain, of course there are better strains if you want a really facepunching high, but for a chilled not to strong nice high it's perfect”

“The mother of all strains. Holy joint.
Afternoon, energizing, simple and easy.
Every time good, i guess it's the weed i would recommend to beginners to laugh a lot. It is not so much powerfull but it's always a good time. If you trust enough a coffeshop don't understimate the possibility of pre-rolled ;)”
“Awesome strain!”
“Has a unique taste like a herbal spice of some sort, or like a really strong incent, on the exhale its like an herbed up chicken taste”
“dank got high as fuck”

“Generally, I liked this strain. It’s very strong and the effect stays very long. 
Though, it can cause depressive phases from time to time. So if you have a history of such events, I don’t recommend this strain.”
“This will make you forget your problems& leave you happy af, great strain👍🏿”
“Great headbuzz as well as an energetic high, perfect for a day weed. First time trying it and I was weird surprised by its spices, it's spicy on the tip of my tongue.”
“Great sativa, didn't disappoint. The focus and buzz didn't last long. Perfect for newbie smokers.”

“I had this strain about a week ago. It's pretty strong and tangy, but that's something anyone can get over. It was definitely affective when it comes to eliminating depression. I recommend it for someone looking for a more uplifting high.”

“Sometimes it is nice to just go back to some of the old school strains and even to this day they still do not disappoint. very tasty strain as well as a nice happy high to get your day started or night started. Ive been smoking this strain for just over 2 weeks now and as an indica lover by nature this sativa has became my favorite sativa to just sit down and chill, either with friends or just by yourself.”

“A very nice overall experience, the Haze was a nice mix of a down tempo soothing high that did not put me to sleep and allowed me to do more with my night”
“Very nice day time strain for sure”

“Very nice relaxing buzz. 😎”
“Incredible and no Wonder a Staple name Haze because Jimmy knows”

“They say OG Kush has the most recognizable and distinct smell and taste, but for me I can sniff out a good Haze cross from just as far. Blue Dream is one of the most popular strains around, and to me it is a light-hearted yet potent strain deserving of its popularity. I compare it to good pop music. Super Silver Haze is a more hardcore cross, but Blue Dream is a reliable multi-use go-to for getting pretty high and ha...”
“very very uplifting body type of high”
“In-between two worlds ;)”
“Amazing and just right😀 Very uplifting smooth body and head high - definitely going to get more”
“havent had some haze in a long time. the smell and taste are so distinct. i love it”

“A favorite sativa of mine, Haze is a wonderful day time strain or the perfect strain for a rush of energy. Happy, stress relieving and energetic. Also, my favorite strain to pair with a night of moderate drinking.”
“Tastes amazing smokes amazing looks amazing ! Uplifting clear head felt it for days!”
“Haze, don't strain your brain”
“Takes me to another world. Strong head high, small body high, that is just...relaxing. Good to watch a film with, listen to music and for chilling.”
“great strain, amazing taste and coming in at 26% thc for this one. very tasty potent sativa.”
“Pretty good strain, it's got a not too long and not too short high and the taste's pretty good”
“SO RARE! SO GOOD!”

task focused.
clarity.
nicely paced vibe.”
“Very Tasty. mmmmmmmmm”
“Dense stuff, THC was moderate but still good”
“way too much paranoia”

“Being from the UK, we only ever see Cheese. But I managed to get my hands on a half ounce of this stuff. Being a veteran Cheese smoker, the smell and taste were far beyond what I was expecting. 

I read a few reviews before I lit up and most people said it's very strong but I have to say that I ended up smoking twice as much as I normally would just to get high. 

Once it hit me though I can say it was an enjoyable h...”
“Tastes great, smells great, smokes great. A solid 4 but on a 10 scale i'd call it an 8.”
“this is a new personal favorite...green bodhi farms awesome work!”
“bought 8 grams today along with some shatter and I'm happy with my choices. at first the bud smelled like a fruit punch bowl lol and the haze effect is amazing nice relaxed chill motivated high”

“I am going to have to disagree with this being a good strain for depression. maybe it is good for some forms but as a manic depressive this strain is far too cerebral to have any medical function.  nice tasty smoke however.”

“Nice but nothing special to be honest. I would rather prefer Hawaiian snow, Super Lemon Haze and Super Silver Haze cause they are stronger. If you like a smooth smoke with little buzz- this strain is it.”

“Rusty Haze =Bubble n Squeek #1 F1 x Metal Haze
Ms Rusty is very enjoyable day time Sativa great morning starter for muscle spacisty and alertness.Picked up in Glendale AZ. 80/20 ratio just enough Indica to help with pain and tightness in back. Red Head Rusty seem's to have high CBN ratio as well the batch I picked up.
Taste: Sweet/Silver/Grape/Haze pretty damn good underrated strain and out of the lime light do to he...”
“Loose pathetic buds, underwhelming flavor and zero medicinal effects. What a waste of money :(”

“This weed has a very earthy and not as pungent smell to it. When inhaled, it will make you cough and it will taste like earth and coffee slightly. It will give you a head high that can lead to a head ache. 2.5/5 its okay”
“Got this on at the clinic called Original Haze I love it sweet tasting and give that euphoria feeling but doesn't make you tired which I like!”
“good bud love the smell and the taste  its one of my favorite buds”
“She smells leathery and densely herbaceous. Like a face full of sage. The smoke is rich in color and odor. The high is euphoric and cerebral, almost enchanting. This is some mystical stuff.”
“love haze!!!! home of da heights baby ;)”

“.. tried this first in Jersey. Bergenfield, just in case anyone is interested. anyway it is DEFINITELY DEFINITELY very potent. my uncle and I bought an 8th and I was on vacation for 5 days. lasted all five days and everyTime we smoked (twice a day, one mini blunt, half smoked each time). the high was tremendously deafening (in a good way).. very heavy. hard to concentrate. I had to drive my uncles BMW to a few places...”
“The worst strain in the world. Awful taste, awful smell. Anything remotely mixed with Haze is a no no for me. Vile. Should be banned lol”

“dees klapt altijd kanker hard in”
“I liked this strain OK. It did make me sleepy though. This strain is excellent if you're having trouble sleeping. Not much of a social type of high for me.”

whenever i smoke it it does nothing for me, im usually like thanks for your expensive haze blunt i need to get high im going to smoke some mids"
